price: 18.Qaad deqsita mari sinni Nabii Huud dirabboyseeh, wohul ken digaallehik, mannak tenee yi digaalaa kee yi meesisso?
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
